title: X Factor E Sports LF TOP and a substitute  Read Below!
body:
We are Currently recruiting people for This team we need players that actually want to play and are looking to put dedication into this, we are a very committed team and want to keep the pace we have already set if you have lower expectations then this isnt the place for you, but if it is please fill out the application below.

Rank:
Availability:
State:
Role:
Champ Pool:
Mic:
Discord:
Age:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:
Why you want to join this team:

Rank:Plat 5 
Availability: anytime after 1 pm pst
State:CA
Role:Mid/Top/Jg
Champ Pool:Can play what our comp lacks.
Mic:Yes 
Discord:yes
Age:20
Strengths:Able to keep track of where most of the enemy champs are and any given time.
Weaknesses:I often disrespect the damage the enemy champ can do
Why you want to join this team:Joined other teams but all seem to lack committment

Availability: anytime after 5pm MTZ
State: KS
Role: Top
Champ Pool: any
Mic: yes
Discord: yes
Age: 16
Strengths: strong laner, roamer, can play any champion i am put on, shot calling, good comunication
Weaknesses: Too cocky
Why you want to join this team: Wanna finda good team to improve with

Why you want to join this team: Looking for a committed team

Weaknesses: Need to work on my Macro
